block.p: Jane Owen Murphy, the daughter of Margaret Murphy of Manhattan and Eugene Murphy of Brooklyn, was married yesterday at the Brooklyn Botanic Garden to Peter Michael Shimamoto, a son of Alice and William Shimamoto of El Cerrito, Calif. Judge Betty E. Staton of Family Court in Brooklyn officiated with Judge Robert Merhige Jr., who is retired from the Federal District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia.

The bride is a television writer who has written for ''As the World Turns'' and ''Another World.'' She graduated from Sarah Lawrence College. Her mother is a producer for ''Biography,'' the series on the A&E cable channel. The bride's father, a lawyer, practices in Brooklyn. The bride's stepmother, Judy Flynn, is a housing developer with the New York City Department of Homeless Services.

Jane Owen Murphy, the daughter of Margaret Murphy of Manhattan and Eugene Murphy of Brooklyn, was married yesterday at the Brooklyn Botanic Garden to Peter Michael Shimamoto, a son of Alice and William Shimamoto of El Cerrito, Calif. Judge Betty E. Staton of Family Court in Brooklyn officiated with Judge Robert Merhige Jr., who is retired from the Federal District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia.

The bride is a television writer who has written for ''As the World Turns'' and ''Another World.'' She graduated from Sarah Lawrence College. Her mother is a producer for ''Biography,'' the series on the A&E cable channel. The bride's father, a lawyer, practices in Brooklyn. The bride's stepmother, Judy Flynn, is a housing developer with the New York City Department of Homeless Services.

The bridegroom is an associate at Parcher, Hayes & Snyder, a New York law firm that specializes in entertainment law. He graduated from the University of California at Berkeley and Harvard Law School. His father, who is retired, was an assistant chief electrical engineer at the Bechtel Corporation, the construction, engineering and management company, based in San Francisco.
